name: English
headerTitle:
Easy way to learn languages
The context you love is the best tutor!
headerSubtitle: Try our app and enjoy learning
contentPleasure: You can find lessons on favourite Youtube channel or Netflix show. Every article you read is full of new words and expressions. Fullfill your vocabulary with expressions that matter to you.
contentMemory: Training is based on materials that you love and enjoy. We use context exactly from the video and articles you watched. Translation depends on context so you shouldn’t learn everything at once.
contentOurApp: Easylang is a FREE extention for your browser and training app for web and mobile.
blog: To find some tips and learn more about Easylang visit
contentSource: Choose anything you like and explore new words and expressions. We recommend to try Easylang with Youtube, Netflix, all online magazines, blogs and your school materials.
musicParagraph: Find out what your favourite song is about
bookParagraph: Read classic and modern literature in original
ProductsTopHeader: We help to learn the language for free and comfortably, doing what you love - watching TV shows, reading books, or listening to music.
ProductsTopText:
In order to start you need:
- set up extension for browser;
- create an account in tutor to work with content you like;
ProductExtensionDescription:
- translates words, helps
to train right on the page
ProductTutorDescription:
- saves words and sentences
to learn them on the way
ExtensionDescription:
— works in Google Chrome
— translates everything you need
ContextTutorDescription:
— easy mechanics of simulator
— lessons are based on your reading and viewing history
— we help your contextual memory
— suitable for learning terms
BottomInfoText:
Still have questions?
Сontact us - we will surely help you!
GetStartedText:
Handy extension
in Google Chrome for learning language
GetStartedBottomText:
Translate words while reading an article or watching your favourite movie
Add words to your personal lessons or train them in the text
Repeat words in the exact context you found them
Understand jokes and expressions
Enrich your personal vocabulary
Learn and repeat words with Easylang Tutor
FirstSlideExtensionBody:
Every single article may become a worthy learning material to strengthen your knowledge of foreign language.

What’s more important is that you enjoy such content.
SecondSlideExtensionBody:
You may choose to translate a singular word, few words, or an entire sentence.

Besides, we can quickly send the selected part for translation.
ThirdSlideExtensionBody: You may keep the translation window open, we got hold on it the entire time.
FourthSlideExtensionBody: If you select “Save to Tutor” option, we will save it for comfortable learning.
FifthSlideExtensionHeader:
In one place the whole
history of learning
FifthSlideExtensionBody: You read a lot, but only some pages will be used to study foreign language.
SixthSlideExtensionHeader:
Repeat words
right in an article
SixthSlideExtensionBody:
You will have the option to go back to the pages that interested you, where we will conceal selected by you words for maximum effect.

You may choose to reveal them if you want to.
SeventhSlideExtensionBody: Your Tutor history  will be a source for various games to repeat the words you selected.
EightSlideExtensionBody: Your personal lessons will be divided into categories based on material you learned or the day you have selected them.
NinethSlideExtensionBody: For fast transition from PC to mobile, scan the QR code available under the “Open on mobile tab”.
TenthSlideExtensionHeader:
And be mobile!
Don't waste your time!
TenthSlideExtensionBody: Now you can revise material anywhere, with games we created for you it will be way more fun!
ScrolledContentPlayerHeader:
One more powerful tool
for learning language
PlayerHeader:
Watch videos subtitle by subtitle
to practice your audition
PlayerTopText:
Watch videos you like
Add subtitles in any languages
Don’t miss a phrase
FirstSlidePlayerHeader:
You may set
two subtitles at once
FirstSlidePlayerBody:
Our programm supports *.mkv type files which can contain multiple syncronized subtitles

These files may also contain multiple audio components to complete experience.
SecondSlidePlayerBody:
Interpretive translation is a more accurate translation of phrases that have undermeaning to them.

It will help you understand common slang and word play in the scene.
ThirdSlidePlayerBody:
We hid some parts of translation so you can try yourself first.

You will be able to check results by pressing eye icon.
FourthSlidePlayerBody:
Sometimes word play will be confusing, so it's important to have Google Translate with you.

While, our program will maximize comfort when during the use by allowing you to select any part of the text.
FifthSlidePlayerBody: We are strictly controlling video scroll so you don't have to mouse drag.
SixthSlidePlayerBody:
It's easy to listen multiple times to the same video fragment with a simple click.

This will help you develop your listening skills.
SeventhSlidePlayerBody: You can choose any sentence, phrase or word and add them to your lessons for later.
EightSlidePlayerBody:
List on the side will help you navigate through the movie.

You will also be able to see what you added to your lessons.
NinethSlidePlayerBody: In order to play scan the QR code.
PlansTitle: We are a free OpenSource startup that strives to help people!
PlansFirstSubtitle: Our company has to buy services from Google. Consider supporting our efforts If you enjoy Easylang by choosing our premium-services!
PlansSecondSubtitle: We do not limit our common user experience, but it comes at a cost of comfort.
